answers.answer: Im 26 weeks & have GD. You can still have sweets & all the fun stuff just in moderation. Its all about eating frequent meals. For most women it goes away after the baby is born but your risk of developing diabetes later in life is higher.
I just found out yesterday that I have it too and met with the nurse today and placed on a strict diet. I just turned 30 weeks today.
I have also, but i try to eat in moderation, but how is the strict diet that u have to eat?
I have pregnancy diabetes. . We will get threw it best wishes♡♥ xx
I just got told today I have to do the 3 hour test because I failed the one hour... I'm 29 weeks tomorrow
29 weeks and i just found out I have GD too :( doc says it should go away after pregnancy.

Im 29weeks on sat and found out yesterday i have gd. I find out excatly what will happen on tuesday but for now iv a meal plan to follow and have to excersize to.The nurse said its controlled with excersize and diet which is gona be intresting because i cant excersize much as iv pelvic girld pain aswell. I wouldnt mind but my baby really doesnt like sweet things so i just think this is unfair. Haha
I'm almost 30 wks and have it too. I have a strict diet, along with testing my blood sugar 4x daily. I was told to stay away from deep fried foods. Waiting to meet with the nutritionist now :(

I too have to take the 3 hrs test tomorrow. had failed the 1 hr test by 34 points. I hate sweeets and diabetes does not run in our family at all!! :(Reading all your posts makes me feel little better. If diet and excercise are the only things that would be added to my daily routine, i dont mind! But the 4x testing everyday sounds little scary.. but i am sure mommies can accept all the pain and trouble for the babies.. anything for them♡♡

question: So i did the test on Monday and my result Come back, doctor call me Tuesday and told me That i have the diabetes :( oh ya and im 28 weeks..... is anyone else going though this? Its goin to be really hard to stay away from all the goodies:( dose it go away after i have my baby?
title: glucose test
